actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain students harmed by the insolvency of Riverside University of Riverside, Calif..

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse any person who was a student at Riverside University at Riverside, California for any principal and interest paid on any federally insured loan. Provides that any lending institution which has an outstanding loan shall be paid by the Secretary both for the principal and any outstanding interest on a student loan.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain students harmed by the insolvency of Riverside University of Riverside, Calif..
